Source.Name: cabextract
Source.Summary: cabextract - a program to extract Microsoft Cabinet files.
Source.Description: Cabinet (.CAB) files are a form of archive, which Microsoft use to distribute their software, and things like Windows Font Packs. The cabextract program unpacks these files.

Package.Name: cabextract
Package.Summary: cabextract - a program to extract Microsoft Cabinet files.
Package.Description: Cabinet (.CAB) files are a form of archive, which Microsoft use to distribute their software, and things like Windows Font Packs. The cabextract program unpacks these files.
